column1: #Text=Katara says : " So , who are you then ? "
#Text=Huu says : " I protect the swamp from folks that want to hurt it , like this fella with his big knife . "
#Text=I reached enlightenment right here under the banyan - grove tree .
#Text=I heard it calling me , just like you did .
#Text=" Huu says : " See this whole swamp is actually just one tree spread out over miles .
#Text=Branches spread and sink , take root , and spread some more .
#Text=" Aang says : " I get how the tree is one big thing , but the whole world ?
#Text=You think you 're any different from me or your friends or this tree ?
#Text=If you listen hard enough , you can hear every living thing breathing together .
#Text=We 're all living together , even if most folks do n't act like it .
#Text=We all have the same roots and we are all branches of the same tree .
#Text=" Katara says : " But what did our visions mean ?
#Text=" Huu says : " In the swamp , we see visions of people we 've lost , people we loved , folks we think are gone .
#Text=But the swamp tells us they 're not .
#Text=Time is an illusion and so is death .
#Text=" Aang says : " But what about my vision ?
#Text=It was someone I had never met .
#Text=" Aang says : " Time is an illusion .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Sorry to interrupt the lesson , but we still need to find Appa and Momo .
#Text=" Aang says : " I think I know how to find them .
#Text=" Tho says : " Set my lines by the river bed !
#Text=Caught ten fish and I killed 'em dead !
#Text=Cut 'em and gut 'em and I tossed the heads in the water to keep them catgators fed .
#Text=" Katara says : " Hey , you guys are waterbenders !
#Text=" Huu says : " You know , scared some folks , swung some vines , the usual .
